downloadTitle: Surface 3 [LTE] - Outside of North America and Y!mobile in Japan
downloadDescription: This device has reached the End of Servicing. The following packages are no longer being updated with newer drivers and firmware.
detailsSection:
The following packages will continue to be updated with the latest drivers and firmware until the date listed in the Surface Driver and Firmware Support Lifecycle Policy.

Surface update history

Cumulative and current drivers and firmware for the Surface 3 [LTE] outside of North America version, including Y!mobile customers in Japan. This package contains drivers for all of the components in the Surface 3 [LTE] outside of North America version, as well as updates to the system firmware that have been released via Windows Update. The driver MSI and ZIP files include all of the drivers and firmware needed to deploy custom images of Windows on your Surface devices. Additionally, the WinTab driver is provided for those professionals needing WinTab compatibility with certain Surface Pen enabled applications.
    The "Date Published" represents the last time this page was updated, so the file you are downloading may be older than the actual "Date Published".
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Archive Section

Consistent with our build lifecycle support, the following packages are no longer being updated with newer drivers and firmware.
  • Wintab_x32_1.0.0.20.zip
  • Wintab_x64_1.0.0.20.zip
  • Surface 3 AssetTag.zip
  • Surface Firmware Tool.msi
  • Surface3_4GLTE-RestOfTheWorld_Win8x_161250_0.msi
  • Surface3_4GLTE-RestOfTheWorld_Win10_161250_0.msi
  • Surface3_4GLTE-RestOfTheWorld_Win10_17134_1902003_0.msi


Please refer to end of lifecycle support:

End of Servicing Date

Windows 10 version history
systemRequirementsSection: Surface 3 [LTE] outside of North America version required for compatibility with these drivers. Also compatible with the Surface 3 [LTE] Y!mobile version in Japan. These drivers and firmware are compatible with Windows 8.1 and Windows 10, including Enterprise versions. If you have the Surface 3 [LTE] ATT version or the Surface 3 [LTE] North America carrier unlocked version, these drivers are not compatible with your device.
installInstructionSection: Use these drivers and firmware to prepare your custom images for enterprise deployment, or to repair problems with custom installations of Windows on your Surface 3 [LTE] outside of North America version. The ZIP file allows you to selectively install or deploy individual drivers. The MSI will install all relevant drivers automatically. Additionally, the WinTab driver is provided for those professionals needing WinTab compatibility with certain Surface Pen enabled applications.
